text: Mike Hicks (August 1937 - 7 September 2017) was a British former politician, former executive member of printersâ€™ union SOGAT, and former General Secretary of the Communist Party of Britain from 1988 through 1998. He was also a members of the Labour Party. He was born in Wapping, London, England. Hicks died on 7 September 2017 in Bournemouth, Dorset, England of a heart attack at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:British communists Category:Politicians from London
title: Mike Hicks
